description: Defines a Java class 'OperationEventNotificationEvent' that extends 'ClusterCommandEvent', representing a specific Zigbee operation event notification, mainly for lock/unlock events, with methods to build command payloads.

classes.name: OperationEventNotificationEvent
classes.description: Represents a Zigbee operation event notification for lock/unlock, extending 'ClusterCommandEvent', with payload creation logic.

methods.name: OperationEventNotificationEvent
methods.description: Constructor initializing the event with cluster info and lock state.

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Builds and returns the byte array payload for the command, encoding source and lock status.
